title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. J, pt. 187 - Miscellaneous Black Bear Regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. J, pt. 187 - Miscellaneous Black Bear Regulations

State Regulations
§ 187.1 - Black bear feeding
§ 187.2 - Training of dogs on black bears

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. J, pt. 187

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, arts. 11, 13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
